description:
SimpleX - the first messaging network operating without user identifiers of any kind - 100% private by design! iOS,
Android and desktop apps ðŸ“±!

Unlike any other existing messaging platform, SimpleX has no identifiers assigned to the users - it does not use phone
numbers (like Signal or WhatsApp), domain-based addresses (like email, XMPP or Matrix), usernames (like Telegram),
public keys or even random numbers (like all other messengers) to identify its users - we do not even know how many
people use SimpleX.
New in v6.4.7:
- fix exporting database larger than 4gb.
- other small fixes.
- Android Play Store requirements:
  - switch to target SDK 35 - please report any new bugs.
  - align all libraries to 16kb memory pages.
- iOS: migrate to XCode 26 (fixes app freeze when keyboard opens in iOS 26.1 beta).
The GitHub release build is independently reproduced by:

Commits:
- ios: fix keyboard freeze (#6343)
- ios: 6.4.6 build 300
- ui: fix repeating accepting conditions on onboarding view (#6373)
- readme: update donation address
- nix: enable 16 KB page sizes (#6357)
- apps/multiplatform: align androidx.camera and libapp to 16kb
- core: upgrade zip (fixes export when database file is larger than 4gb
- ios: update core library
- core: 6.4.7.0
- ios: fix iOS 26 (#6419)
- core: update zip library to build in ghc8.10.7
- core: 6.4.7.1
- ios: v6.4.7 (build 310)
- v6.4.7: android 325 (target SDK 35), desktop 123
